website_summaries.verdict: A good set of neoprene-coated dumbbells that includes some nice extras.
pros: Features 3-pound, 5-pound, and 8-pound weights and a stand
Includes a 2-year warranty and an assembly tool for the stand
Handles are contoured for an easy, comfortable grip
cons: The stand is a bit narrow and can tip easily if bumped or when removing weights

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous - one dumbbell broke in HALF on first use!
customer_reviews.text: During my first session using these, one of the dumbbells broke in HALF! The only thing connecting them now is a tiny bit of the rubber coating. Thank God I was able to hold both pieces in my hand and keep it from tumbling to the floor. These are dangerous -- if the pieces had actually fallen, they could have broken whatever was there: face, chest, foot, child, pet, floor! I'll never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, flimsy plastic stand bent completely IN A DAY
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t even gotten a chance to use the weights yet and I’m already super disappointed. I put the stand together the day after excitedly receiving the package, and when I came home from work the next day I discovered the stand had completely bent from the weight of the dumbbells in just ONE DAY. Ridiculous. The price seemed great with a stand included, but this is just a total fail.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Stock

customer_reviews.title: Nice little dumbbells set, but the stand is flimsy and narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for some light physical therapy exercises for my injured rotator cuff. The dumbbells are actually nicely designed and seem to be reasonably high quality. The stand, however, is quite narrow and flimsy. Setting the weights on the stand on the carpet in the room where I planned to exercise, they would invariably be tipped over by the next morning. It’s not a big deal, but something to consider. I don’t regret the purchase, especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Percolato

customer_reviews.title: Don't think twice, buy it
customer_reviews.text: For this price, you get 6 weights of superb quality, a stand ( plastic but sturdy) , a screw driver(not the best, but reusable and better than any other free screw driver privided for assembly of furniture or whatever), and extra screws (2). Plus the colors of the weights are sooooooo soooo cute. It doesn't get any better, I repeat it doesn't get any better. I bought One, only One Five lb weight at Marshalls for 9.99 and I carried it home. #amazontherealmvp
customer_reviews.author: Eury martinez

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase and quality of item
customer_reviews.text: I was on a kick ordering Denise Austin movies for at home workouts with my crazy schedule I needed an at home workout. Then I stumbled upon these weights which I needed for some of the Denise Austin workouts. I am very happy with the packaging and they arrived safely. The stand works and the weights are so fun and cute color wise. I also really like weights are wholly covered in the material all the way around and it is a thick later so the dumbbells are securely encased in the colored cover. Happy lifting everyone!
customer_reviews.author: FlyingUnicorns

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: These have obviously been used!!! I took these pic directly after taking them out of the box. If I wanted gross used ones I would have just bought a pair off Craigslist for 5 bucks and taken the chance of being murdered.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Edington

customer_reviews.title: Missing weights and no customer support
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for a family member- set of weights 5, 8, 12 lbs with stand. Pretty embarrassed when I learned the 5lb weights were missing from the set. What's worse is that the customer support website doesn't work. The customer support phone number goes directly to voicemail (it's a apparently a cell phone?!). The mailbox is full and I'm unable to leave a message. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: I like the feel of them right off
customer_reviews.text: Just got them in. I like the feel of them right off. The colors are great. They make them look good anywhere you place them. The coating also makes your hands feel better than bare metal. I plan to use them to strengthen my hand and arm muscles up. I choose the 3,5 and 8 pound set to start with. They are not to costly and you can't go wrong with these. They fit your hands well and I'm 6'2" so my hands are big. To me they just seem to feel good and fit right and that's what matters to me the most.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great Weights. Wobbly Stand.
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought these. I started a fairly intense workout program at home and these were a perfect addition to the weights I currently use. They are easy to grip and dont slide around in my hand when I'm using them. They help quite a bit with the exercises requiring lighter weights and they are easy to store on the stand. The only thing keeping this from 5 stars is that the stand itself is extremely wobbly and flimsy. If the stand was made a little better, I'd give it 5 stars. Otherwise, it's a great set!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: weights are great, stand is weak
customer_reviews.text: I love the weights! However, the stand is very weak and wobbly. It's 3 plastics dowels with pre-drilled holes you are given to screw in with little metal screws. Unfortunately none of the holes are deep or straight enough so the screws go in all diagonally and not all the way so it feels like it wants to crack and split the dowel (maybe why a spare one is included in the pack?) I'm going remove the screws and glue these in with gorilla glue! Anyway, the result is a very wobbly rack that will fall over, so until I get some glue they'll just have to lay on my floor.
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great weights, useless stand.
customer_reviews.text: The dumbbells are of good quality, are comfortable to gold and are a good weight distribution with their 3, 5, and 8 pound increments. This product gets a 4 star however, because the stand is a joke. There are the two pieces of plastic as per the image online, but absolutely nothing to make them free standing. Unless I'm doing something wrong, the stand almost immediately slides sideways so the weighta are leaning against the wall they're next to. Essentially the stand is useless. Otherwise a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weights are good, but stand could be better
customer_reviews.text: Background: Needed the weights for some light at-home weight training exercises. Pros: - Nice rubber casing around the weights. They have a good grip feel and cushion the weights so they won't scrape my floor. - Handle has a nice width - not too wide and not too narrow. The contoured edges give a nice feel. Cons: - The stand is quite wobbly and the holes where I was supposed to drill the screws were not lined up at all.
customer_reviews.author: spaceballadTop Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The stand is very cheap and not sturdy enough to hold all the weights.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for at a great price. As others have said the stand is ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for at a great price. As others have said the stand is cheap and somewhat flimsy but it does the job. I don't expect the stand to last long but I didn't order this product for the stand so I'm not concerned.
customer_reviews.author: CSoegaard

customer_reviews.title: The stand cuts into the dumbells and rips them
customer_reviews.text: I've had them for less than a month and noticed the stand, which is hard plastic, has been cutting into the dumbbells where they sit on the stand. The plastic is a little sharp here. This is slowly creating holes/slits in the outside of the dumbbell. I have taken them off the stand but full expect the dumbbells to continue to tear open slowly. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive ratings, garbage rack
customer_reviews.text: The weights themselves are fine, actually pretty nice. Where it fails is the rack, its garbage. It is incredibly top heavy and easy to knock over (my 5 year old has knocked it over repeatedly so i got rid of it) minus one star. There also is a coupon for free workout straps with a review but if it is a negative review contact them first so they can fix it. I hate this practice, minus one star. Do what you will with my review.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyRed

customer_reviews.title: Well balanced & easy to clean. They have a chemical smell.
customer_reviews.text: I needed 1 pound weights & these seemed like a good option. I like the color & the compactness. They have a chemical smell. I put them outside hoping it goes away completely. After several weeks there's still a smell if I hold them to my nose but not when I use them. Compared to when they arrived they aren't bad. If you are sensitive to chemical smells you might not want these. Had it not been the smell I would have given them 5 stars. Pros. They are the perfect size & are well balanced. I chose these dumbbells because of the easy clean coating. Cons: The vinyl coating has a chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: Polly B

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: These dumbbells came in a well packed box. They provided a screwdriver which made it really easy to assemble the stand. No guessing what size screwdriver to get for the screw heads. They even provided an extra plastic brace. Love the easy handle that is on the top. I do my workouts in my backyard and sometimes in my house if it's raining, so being able to move all the weights around is very convenient. I can pick-up the stand with all the weights and the weights are nicely seated in the stand. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Plan on building your own stand.
customer_reviews.text: The dumbbells are excellent the weights are as expected and the covering makes them easy to grip and the price is right. The stand, however, is almost useless. The sides are made of a thin plastic and connected with plastic dowels. It is difficult to put together as the self tapping screws do not turn easily with a manual screwdriver (provided) and unless the dowels are held with a pair of pliers they rotate before the screws are fully seated.. I used a power screwdriver and even with that the fit of the connecting posts was not good. Once the weights are on the stand it wobbles a lot and I expect it will eventually collapse.
customer_reviews.author: Kilbarchan

customer_reviews.title: Weights are great but the stand is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set to get a nice stand to store the weights. I put the stand together and it was off, and it leaned, so I took it apart thinking I needed to adjust it somehow and tried to switch around the middle pieces or screw it in tighter or looser but to no avail. I was surprised to get the package and take out the stand parts to find flimsy plastic pieces for the stand, but it should have worked. I am not happy with this because it falls over when I set it on my carpeted floor. Not a good product and it's called "Balance" which is ironic.
customer_reviews.author: MH_3

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expected from the pictures. The dumbells are tiny, cheaply made and full of defects and dents. The weight does even feel evenly distributed from one dumbell to the other.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Dumbbell Set for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this product. Since so many people stuck at home during quarantine have gotten into fitness , it's hard to find a decent weight set that doesn't break the budget, so this all in one set for under 50 bucks was perfect for me. Pros: affordable, compact, super easy to assemble, stylish, and it even came with a nice mini screwdriver! Cons: dumbbells had a slight chemical odor upon unwrapping, rack is made of a flimsy plastic (but as you can see it's sturdy enough to hold the weights and does the job) , there weren't any instructions? ( although it's was very to figure out without them) All in all, its doing the job.
customer_reviews.author: Frans

customer_reviews.title: Weights are fine, stand sucks
customer_reviews.text: The weights are as expected, but I was thinking the stand was going to be something heavy duty like metal. Nope. Lightweight, flimsy plastic. And setting it up has been a nightmare. I can’t get the screws all the way tight (which is probably contributing to it’s instability) and the whole thing falls over even though they’re mostly tightened. Yikes. No matter what, I’m keeping because even the weights by themselves are way cheaper than I could find at any brick-and-mortar store.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee

customer_reviews.title: perfect beginner's weight set!
customer_reviews.text: Like so many, I started working out at home due to the pandemic. After building some endurance, I was ready to add strength training and wanted dumbbells - but they're hard to find! I've been stalking this set all summer, waiting to catch it at a good price - they sell out so fast and then are only available at crazy prices! I finally scored a set that arrived this week... It is PERFECT for me as I begin to add weights to youtube HIIT and aerobic work-outs. These are easy to grip, with nice weight gradations for making steady progress. And the set comes with an easy-to-assemble stand - and even a small screwdriver! Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Lacon

customer_reviews.title: Love the weights, but the stand is total garbage
customer_reviews.text: I waited a WHILE for these weights to ship. Everyone working out from home right now has been buying them, rightfully so. I really love these weights. They absolutely up my home workout game and encourage me to use them more often. Great purchase. That said, as much as I appreciate that there was a small screwdriver included in the package to assemble the stand, the stand does not stay straight for anything. I've assembled, disassembled, and reassembled several times, but the stand simply does not stay straight and leans over, bringing the weights with it. It really looks trashy in my home, but I'm pleased with the weights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for a Home Weight Set
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with the price and quality of these weights. The little stand is an added bonus, but note, it is plastic, not metal. I actually didn't bother to assemble it based on other reviewers saying it bends/collapses under the weight of the hand weights. The weights are nicely coated with a non slip material that also won't make a metal clank if they hit together. The grip sizes increase with the size of the weight, so the 8lb grip is large-ish, but it works fine for me. I've been working out at home the past few months so these are a welcome addition to my mini "home gym."
customer_reviews.author: BMG Boston, MA

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money 💰 🏋️‍♀️🤸‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: An extra screw and peg came with the "stand" - I thought it was going to be delivered assembled. No big deal. I had a little trouble tightening the screws but eventually got the stand put together and it holds the 32 lbs of weight just fine. I like the different colors of the weights and the material they're made out of. I have a pair of 10lb steel weights and they're not as easy to work out with.
customer_reviews.author: Darsi Axford

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: So excited to get these colorful hand weights. I was a bit surprised at how expensive weights have become so I shopped around. These were the best price by far. The tree, which was the biggest selling point for me, was easy to assemble. Just know that the braces are not threaded so you have to give a firm turn with the screw driver included by the manufacturer. They are easy to handle. Although I do have relatively small hands. I like that they have a slightly rough texture instead of being too slick providing a better grip and less likelihood of slipping while lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Rose B.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD Weights. But do NOT count on the TERRIBLE stand.
customer_reviews.text: SUMMARY: weights good, stand bad, buy ONLY for the weights. THE WEIGHTS: The weight accuracy ranges from very close and 2 oz off, so not bad in my opinion. THE STAND is SURPRISINGLY inadequate. I have a hard time believing anyone thought this stand would work. It's a bad design attempts to balance the 32 lbs on a very narrow base that is made of terribly flimsy plastic. It topples over unless you choose to put it against the wall (leaning toward the wall).
customer_reviews.author: MarkR

customer_reviews.title: Start your journey to fitness
customer_reviews.text: A small set of weights to get you started in your journey to fitness. The coating on the weights has great "hand feel." Extremely easy to grip and feel comfortable. The colors are vibrant. The only negative about the set is the pyramid display is flimsy. It is more frustrating to re-rack a pair after use. I say ditch the display rack and put them on the floor. Still a great price for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Product was packaged with care, assembling was easy, the weights look and feel great! They were sold out for awhile there but so glad they became available again. What I like about this set is it includes 3lbs, 5lbs and 8lbs whereas many others are typically 2lbs, 3lbs and 5lbs. This set is much more fitting for my needs and the cost for the set is very fair.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Competitive pricing.
customer_reviews.text: I have zero complaints. Easy to grip. Coating makes them comfortable. Being stuck at home during quarantine/shelter in place due to COVID-19, I knew I needed to still get my workouts in to avoid serious muscle atrophy and to help with overall attitude and ability to mom. I hopped online and ordered dumbbells in both sizes that I normally use at the gym. This plus running outside has given me a renewed sense of hope ;) I realize this may sound dramatic, but I'm a single mom and I have 4 kids at home. So hallelujah.
customer_reviews.author: MImom

customer_reviews.title: Weights good, Stand SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: The weights are great. No issues as of yet. The holder is another story. It's a flimsy POS that doesn't look like it's going to last long. Why the hell can't a company put a little quality into their products. I guess they needed to eek every last cent in profit. A few more pennies to add some stability, instead they get the cheapest chinesium crap. Hope they enjoy their few extra profit. The optimistic side of me says, thanks for providing a pattern that I can use to make a quality stand out of wood.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: Plastic stand easy to assemble. Weights are very comfortable & I love the bright colors. The stand seemed to do great a few months ago when purchased, but since has decided to lean. I've adjusted the weights several times, but found that propping against wall or couch works best. If you have a different stand to use, that may be more ideal or just don't use stand. It was a good idea to include stand by manufacturer; however, the plastic should be much thicker to hold/balance the weight. Great dumbbells so far tho & I didn't purchase for the stand :)
customer_reviews.author: Kathy P.

customer_reviews.title: Great range of Dumbbell weights for home toning
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect for at-home workouts. The weights are well-wrapped with a slightly texturized coating, and the grip areas are a comfortable diameter for my hands (I wear size small ladies gloves). The stand was a nice addition and was simple to assemble. Since it has been difficult finding reasonably priced dumbbells in higher Weights (like 10 -15 lbs), this set is a good compromise— I will be able to double up on some of them to get close to the higher weights I need. And, the price was quite good!
customer_reviews.author: ShopperDiva

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this weight set. I ordered them so that I could be a little more active at home. They took about 2 1/2 weeks to get here which was pretty quick considering they were out of stock. I struggled a bit with screws, not hard but didn't seem like the fit easily when putting the stand together. I took me about 10 mins to put it together. It's nice that it came with its own screw driver. I agree with previous reviews that the stand isn't sturdy. However I consider the stand bonus. Overall very nice set of weights.
customer_reviews.author: Bry

customer_reviews.title: Weights seem fine but the stand is useless
customer_reviews.text: The weights themselves appear to be fine. They're easy to hold and the grip is comfortable. I don't know how they'd hold up for heavy workouts, but for my use, they're great. The stand, as advertised, is really easy to assemble. Unfortunately, it's useful for actually holding the weights. The base is too narrow and the stand tips over. But, thanks to other reviewers, I knew not to expect too much from the stand. Maybe it would be OK if it's not on carpet, but I have my doubts even then.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Disaster as a customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets and they were nice, The stand is horrible and keeps falling down. When I bought these sets balance from contacted me and ask me to write a review on Amazon which is ok because I was happy with the product(like a month ago) but they asked me to encourage others to do the same. Anyway, at that point they promise a set of resistance bands if I write a positive place! They did not contacted me so be aware that anything could happen. Stay safe!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ONLY REC'D 5LB WEIGHTS - 8 & 12lb weights & rack not incl in box!  BALANCEFROM NOT RESPONDING!
customer_reviews.text: Of the six weights and stand I ordered and paid $89 for, I only received 2 of the 5lb weights. I have contacted customer service 3x and they are very slow to respond and keep asking me for more information each time they do answer as if this "red tape" they are requiring of me is to wear me out so I don't keep trying to press the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Paige NeJame

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set of weights
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good quality set of weights and priced pretty well too. With all the gyms closed, and no hope of them opening soon, I bought these to workout at home. They are easy to hold and I love the bright colors. The only complaint I have is the stand that came with the weights is very flimsy and does not hold up the weights well. After a few days, it was lopsided so I had to throw is out. Not a big deal as I bought a metal rack to replace it, but the weights are definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Fran

customer_reviews.title: Mismatched weights
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a mismatched count - one 3 lbs dumbbell and three 5 lbs. I would like to be able to exchange additional 5 lbs one for a missing 3 lbs dumbbell
customer_reviews.author: h4x0r

customer_reviews.title: Great for jogging!
customer_reviews.text: I adored these little dumbells! They took very long to get here, but, I am glad they made it! I got these weights for my mother, to jog and do yoga with. She loves them! They aren't too light, but they are not too heavy. 4 pounds seems to be just the right weight for someone overweight, looking for something a little extra in their workout. Even I use them from time to time. We both highly suggest them! The build quality is nice and they are small, never in the way.
customer_reviews.author: David Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: 4.5/5 Received these weights today. I'm a group fitness instructor, who uses weights at work all the time. These weights are great. Fit well in a female hand. Great grip. Weight is nearly dead on - 8 lbs were 7.9 and 8.1 according to our kitchen scale. Looking forward to using them for home workouts. Half star off for stand. It works, but I'll be very careful using it. For the cost, it's fine. I feel like I paid for the weights. But, a simple improvement world be 2 more connecting points between the 2 sides. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: AllisonMom

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of weights, flimsy rack
customer_reviews.text: I really like the set of weights. They are easy to hold and have a comfortable grip. The colors are bright and cheery and not overly feminine or masculine. The coating is textured enough to feel nice without being too rough or abrasive. The only minor complaint that I have is that the rack is a bit on the flimsy side. It's great if you plan on leaving the set in one location, but if you plan on moving it from one area to another I am not sure how long it will hold up. But seeing as it comes with an extra cross piece and its own screwdriver, it's not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: After looking for what felt like forever for some dumbells and watching the price fluctuate like crazy on these, I snagged these for a reasonable price. They came super fast and overall I am pleased. There were no instructions for the stand, but it was easy to figure out. It's pretty light for the weight it holds and will collapse if pulled on. The dumbells themselves are great. Some weird plastic spots but nothing the effects their use. I am really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look exactly like the Picture, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Love the three sizes and the stand is great and easy to assemble. The price is fantastic, I compared to similar sets and prices were double triple the amount I paid. When I placed by order, it was out of stock but I was willing to wait. I ordered 5/15 and received the dumbbells' on 5/24/20. Almost a month ahead of original available date.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Margaret

customer_reviews.title: One day I'll use them...just being honest
customer_reviews.text: They look great sitting in my bedroom collecting dust. One day I'll use them. Don't get discouraged...there's always tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Louisa K Breaux

customer_reviews.title: Great 3 sets of weights for the price and the grips are nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it comes with 3, 5 and 8 lbs. I like having the stand to store them neatly though the stand is not the most solid, but I think it is totally workable if one is careful when picking up and putting the weights in the stand. The coating of the weights make it easy to grip. So far, I have done one workout with the weights and am totally happy about it. (I only have them for 2 days). All in all, I thought it is a great beginner set and great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Snobot

customer_reviews.title: Great weight set for the price!
customer_reviews.text: After months of trying to buy weights during the shutdown, I was finally able to order this set! I ordered in advance for what I thought was a month wait but ended up only being a week later. They are easy to grip, sturdy and fit perfectly on my Peloton bike. The stand is also a very useful accessory. Now I can finally up my workouts. Would recommend purchasing these in other sizes if they become available.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Friscia

customer_reviews.title: Missing 8lb weights AND parts of the stand
customer_reviews.text: So this arrived weeks after I ordered it, which is fine- Covid delay, I get it. BUT it was not only missing the set of 8lb weights (the 3 and 5lb sets were included), it also only had the outside pieces of the rack, with nothing to connect them, so it's basically just two pieces of plastic. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Thank you BalanceFrom!
customer_reviews.text: These are the dumbbells I've been looking for! During quarantine, the price of dumbbells has skyrocketed. The only brands I've seen that sell dumbbells at a sensible price are BalanceFrom and Amazon. Once these were in stock I received them quickly and assembly of the dumbbell rack was so easy!! The dumbbells feel sturdy and the grips don't slip. The only thing that concerned me was that the rack seems a little unsteady. But overall, I am definitely going to enjoy these!
customer_reviews.author: Katy Lee

customer_reviews.title: YES. TO. THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I read many negative reviews about this product but we’re in quarantine, I need my exercise, and it was an amazing price. I took a chance, waited about a week and a half to have it shipped, this is the best little weight triad I have ever seen online for the price!!! Sure, the weight stand might be a little flimsy... But you can stack the weights on top of each other if you really want it to be organized and it breaks. The manufacturer even provides screwdrivers extra nails and extra connecting devices. EXCELLENT purchase. HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Barbells for Seniors
customer_reviews.text: These dumbbells are just as described and just what we wanted. The rack is perfect and was so easy to assemble with the screwdriver that came with the set. This order was sent promptly once they were in stock. Now we will have to put them to use and get "physically fit" again.
customer_reviews.author: Anon.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great quality
customer_reviews.text: I recently started working out at home and I couldn’t believe how expensive some simple weights were from Target and even Amazon when bought separately. These get the job done well and the rack they came with is slim so storage is a breeze (very important when your living room is also your gym). Granted the rack is a little flimsy being thin plastic that’s storing 32lbs of weight but I’ve been using it almost every day for 3 months and haven’t had any issues yet. I highly recommend these weights if you’re looking for a good set that won’t break the bank!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen E. Mulvey

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete order and terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set and it came missing two of the dumbbells and the bolts or pieces necessary to put the stand together. I tried to call the company for support and I got their voice mail message and the mail box was full, so I wasn’t able to leave a message. I sent an email but have not heard back yet. The weights that I have look great. The stand is pretty cheap but ok. But I basically got ripped off because I only received 4 of the 6 weights in the set
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Weight are suitable, the stand is not substantial
customer_reviews.text: The weights are comparable to others; the colors are nice and almost decorative. The stand was unsteady and missing a predrilled hole in the middle so we had an extra screw left over. the stand was initially too unstable and would not hold the weights and fell over. so had to figure out a way to drill a hole for that screw to engage the middle, so as to better stabilize the stand. We would have preferred an option for 6 lb intermediate weight rather than 5 lb.
customer_reviews.author: eccoguy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman in my 50's. Dumbbell set came in very well crafted packaging and the stand was easy to assemble. I love the colors and the feel of the free weights and have used them right away. I like the hexagonal shape of the ends and the fact that it is a combo of different weights so that I can start with lighter ones.
customer_reviews.author: SeeMore

customer_reviews.title: Love My New Weights for Working Out at Home!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set of weights and it was delivered a few days later with no issues! I was super excited to receive this motivation to work out from home during this crazy quarantine, and have been doing so every chance I get! The stand is a great feature to store them when not in use. My toddlers love working out with mommy using the smallest 3 lb weights, which are just perfect for them! I am very satisfied with my purchase, and highly recommend ordering BalanceFrom GoFit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan & Katie Canar

customer_reviews.title: Great product and even includes storage stand!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a decent dumbbell set for a while. I could not afford a lot of the name brand sets so I held off on my purchase. I found these and figured I would give them a try for the price. The quality is great! The material allows for a nice grip, even with a good sweat during a workout. They smell a little funky right out the package but the smell faded quickly (after a few uses). The stand was easy to set up and overall sturdy. It takes up minimal space which I also enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Home Weight Set
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect home weight set. This is great for HIIT, Strength, Barre and Pilates classes that call for weights. The 8lbs are great for heavy and the 3lbs are perfect for barre and pilates. Prior to this Covid shut down I was working out 5-6 days/week and these help immensely to keep up and not loose and muscle mass. The holder is great so that they are stacked, easy to store and don't take up a lot of space. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to shift in availability, and price between $35-65. I ordered it from my "save for later" list when it allowed me to click "purchase" although it showed currently available at a price around $40. About two weeks later, I received a notification that it had shipped (and I was charged), and I received it a couple days later. In post-surgical PT during COVID stay-at-home, I appreciated being able to find a set like this for this price. The rack does seem a little flimsy, so I store it against a wall, but it was easy to assemble and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: SAS

customer_reviews.title: Corona weights 💪
customer_reviews.text: Overall very happy with these dumbbells and holder. In the corona world we live in, dumbbells are hard to come by and I have not seen many in stock anywhere. I ended up purchasing these for $99 which I felt was very affordable and will be using these much more often as I don’t see myself going back to a public gym this year. Weight holder is nice and can adjust to be more narrow for carrying and for storing purposes
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Reading

customer_reviews.title: You will not find a better price!
customer_reviews.text: These weights are actually fantastic! If you have been shopping around, you know how expensive weights can be. I was skeptical about these due to the low price, but I am so impressed and these are perfect for everyone. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 was because of the stand it comes with. It is quite flimsy and not really great for holding the weights. But they could have shipped it without it and I wouldn't have cared. I am genuinely impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Mikala

customer_reviews.title: Great weights for the price
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with these if you are just looking for cheap weights to work out at home with. The stand is a little flimsy, but it doesn't cause an issue if you don't move it around a lot. They seem to be weighted pretty accurately for what it is worth. The texture is nice and allows for a easy grip. Worth the price if you are looking for cheap weights.
customer_reviews.author: Daocsm

customer_reviews.title: After reading many reviews I was reluctant to order these weights ( i got the 50 pound set)
customer_reviews.text: Luckily, the set I got has held up well. The stand has stayed strong, but I would not life it with the weights placed in it. It holds up ok if it just for keeping the weights on the stand for easy access. the weights themselves are good quality and I have had no problems. The set I have is the 8,12,20 pound set - total weight 50 pounds. I can see if is a heavier set the stand will not hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: PokemomTop Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone else I ordered dumbbells during the pandemic. Based on the reviews and description I didn't think these would be great quality but needed some. When I got them I was surprised, they are the neoprene material. I agree that the stand is too flimsy but it wasn't the reason I bought this particular set (which was variety of dumbbell weights, material, and availability).
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Effective!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly how it appears - set of weights at 3lbs, 5lbs, and 8lbs. Colors are vibrant, neoprene is smooth, stand was easy to assemble and even came with an extra set of parts, which is super nice in case a screw gets stripped or something happens during assembly. I also really like that the ends are large. That way, I can put them on the ground and do push ups, yoga, etc and protect my injured wrist. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Mollie

customer_reviews.title: Great set for home use
customer_reviews.text: I have been eyeing for a nice dumbbell set for quite some time, and stumbled upon this. I like the weight variety in the set - 5, 8 and 12 lbs pair which is a perfect combination for most of the exercises. Its a good set for beginners to middle level. I was so happy that it comes with a stand so the weights are neatly organized as compared to my other weights which just lie on the floor and clutter the space.
customer_reviews.author: Ashok

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted/expected
customer_reviews.text: No surprises. This set is exactly what was pictured. Nice neoprene covered light weight set. Easy to grip, easy to read the weight, easy to use. The stand was easy to put together (they even provided the needed tool), and they provided a replacement dowel for the inevitable failure (the stand is rigid plastic that probably wont last a year of use, but I didn't buy this set for the stand...in my opinion it was just a perk to the set). Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for a starter weight set!
customer_reviews.text: The weights are great with a grippy textured surface. The value for the 3 sets of weights is spot on. I am very happy with the texture and quality of the weights. The package came with a small screwdriver and extra parts for the stand which made the assembly easy. However, the stand is a bit too narrow without enough support at the base so it’s unstable and usually falls over when I try to use it. Either a wider stand or a couple extra feet at the base of the stand would make it usable.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great dumbbell set
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! Assembly of the stand was a breeze, just a couple of bolts and you're all set. Got those for my fiancee and she loves them. They are a great addition to our home gym and she has been using them daily since Christmas (so about 3 months) with no issues. She takes good care of them and puts them back on the rack after each use so they look brand new still. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ivo Pavlov

customer_reviews.title: Good weights, bad stand
customer_reviews.text: These weights are fine and good. The stand however, slopes and wants to fall over. The way it’s constructed, it can easily lean as there nothing keeping it stable. I think it’s that way so the pieces can disassemble and be shipped flat, but the result is a poorly structured stand - and these are weights, probably the last thing you’d want on a shaky stand. Currently leaning against the wall, looking ugly
customer_reviews.author: Paul Leach

customer_reviews.title: Great dumbbells!
customer_reviews.text: These are *by far* the best price for this variety of weights. No other store came close. The weights are all the correct poundage (I weighed them) and are both comfortable and sturdy. The little stand is easy to put together and a great way to keep the weights organized and out of the way when not in use. It even came with a screwdriver to assemble. Packaging was kept to a minimum, keeping the weights safe and avoiding too much extra waste. Really excited about finalling purchasing these for myself!
customer_reviews.author: W. Hagan

customer_reviews.title: Flimsey stand
customer_reviews.text: The dumbbells were exactly what I was looking for. They are easy to hold and there is just a slight, but gentle, roughnees, or texture, to them, so when your hands are sweating, you can still maintain your grip. The stand however, is pretty flimsey plastic and I noticed within just a couple days, that the bottom was starting to bend inward. I basically don't use the stand because it is going to buckle. I use it to put the weights away, behind the couch when the grandchildren are coming, that's it. For the money, absolutely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Upnatem5

customer_reviews.title: Great set of weights during covid lockdown!
customer_reviews.text: After weeks of waiting, we were finally able to get a set of these dumbbells for home exercise during COVID lock down. They feel comfortable to hold, and come securely packaged. We bought the 32lb set with 3/5/8lb pairs. As others have mentioned, the rack is definitely wobbly. We have stored our weights in a wire basket. Overall, can't beat this set for the price! Highly recommend. A+
customer_reviews.author: PAS

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a good set of weights for awhile. Since COVID, they were all sold out at local stores. Some online stores charge a lot due to shipping heavy weights, but this place was really reasonable. They came in well packaged. The stand is not the sturdiest; however, it is fine if you are gentle with it. It is working great for my stay-home workout routine. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: The stand is worthless
customer_reviews.text: The dumbbells are great. The stand is made of flimsy plastic that can’t support the weight. It’s worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Nicooleykid

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect
customer_reviews.text: The weights are covered in a sueded vinyl. They are very easy to handle and hold. No slipping. I don't need to wear the gloves I use at the gym. These were purchased in this time of Covid, when the gym is not an option. These weights arrived on time and totally get the job done. For a small person such as me, the weight choices are perfect--a pair ecah of 3,5 and 8 pounds. And the stand provides a convenient spot to keep them organized and out of the was. Assembly of the stand was required, but it took about 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Many complaints from people about the stand . yes it's plastic. But.. It's on my carpet,cats playing with it and it's fine. It is possible to tip of over when on carpet,but so what. For the money this is a great deal!! The dumbells are great quality,easy to hold. The best review I can give is to tell you..I going to order another set in larger weights. Buy these..its a good deal
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good Price for Set
customer_reviews.text: We received these weights. We purchased for the price and variety. Upon arrival, they have a very nice feel. So far, besides the stand being an obvious cheep plastic, the set and stand appear to function as expected. So far we have not experienced any negative aspect for the integrity of the weights. Based on reviews, we will not be "dropping" them to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: ARM-C

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect. Nice colors and easy and comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars. I drove to Walmart to get them cheaper. However, Walmart didn't have the 8 pound weights in stock. Came back home and ordered on Amazon. I received them in two days. They are perfect. Nice colors and easy and comfortable to use. The stand is fragile but does its job. Buying the set was cheaper than buying individual sets. Will buy this type of dumbbell again when I increase weight poundage.
customer_reviews.author: Allegiance

customer_reviews.title: Stand is unstable and constantly falls
customer_reviews.text: The weights are fine. But my purpose for thiis purchase was mainly to have a stable stand to hold weights. This stand fails. It is unstable. It is too narrow to stand for more than a few hours. It fell in the middle of the night, startling household more than once. Not worth the disruptions and possible injuries for pets and humans nearby. I had high hopes, but this is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: La Smurf

customer_reviews.title: Good value. 4.5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Weights arrived well packaged and protected. As stated by most, the rack is flimsy and constantly falls over (I will be constructing a 2x4 leg in the middle to stabilize). Weights have good grip and nice finish. I reluctantly removed 1 star (.5) bc of the known issue of the rack, but for the price point I don't know what you would expect. Can fairly easily be stabilized or just set them on the floor. Just know going in you are getting what you pay for, but still a solid product for the money!
customer_reviews.author: F. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great set of Weights!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking set of weights. They are easy to handle and will be a positive addition to my work out routines. Because of the state of the world today, I will be doing a lot more working out in my home. Grateful to be able to purchase these dumbbells. They actually came earlier than I was expecting. It came all in one box and it wasn't too heavy to carry. All the weights & the rack were wrapped individually & securely. Overall very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product but incomplete...
customer_reviews.text: Love the three sets of dumbbells however, the stand came with a nice screwdriver but only 3 screws so I am not able to assemble the weight stand as I need to screw in 6 screws or it falls apart. No instructions and tried to go to the website support page and it says not found. For the weights so far, worth the money but for the stand and service quality, very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: meiper2000

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal for 3-5-8 lb Dumbbell Set
customer_reviews.text: It's ALWAYS great when your package arrives much earlier than expected! The price of just over $30 was the best I found for this weight-range set. No pink dumbbells -- this caught my eye first when I was searching for a 3-5-8 lb set since I am one of a minority of females who hates pink! And putting together the weight rack was quick. My husband was pleasantly surprised by the easy set up for the rack that came with a screwdriver and extra screws! My husband and I are looking forward to using these! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: The Rack is CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: The whole reason I purchased this set over others was for the rack. If you are only interested in the weights and not a rack to hold them then this is an ok purchase. But if you really want a storage rack like me don’t waste your time/money. The rack looks like it was cheaper than the screwdriver it comes with to build it. It wobbles, is insanely flimsy, and just barely holds the weights. I put this together mere mins ago and wouldn’t let my daughter near it because I’m afraid of weights crushing her feet if she but barely touches it wrong.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of weights for the $
customer_reviews.text: Nice assortment of weights and the colors are great too! Based on other reviews concerning the stand, I agree that the stand is a bit flimsy, and particularly wobbly on carpeted surfaces. To minimize the wobble, I placed a ceramic tile under the stand and this helped to minimize the wobble and stabilize the stand a bit. Aside from this minor issue, the weights are fine and I’m pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: jcraw

customer_reviews.title: Essential Equipment for Home Work Outs
customer_reviews.text: I have had a long time membership to a local gym and, like many others, scrambled to maintain my fitness regime during the COVID-19 quarantine. This set of weights was perfect for my Zoom fitness classes that combined moves for tabata, boot camp and HIIT which required free weights of different sizes. The provided stand made storage simple. The weight are easy to hold and the neoprene coating prevents slipping from sweat. Terrific price with expedient shipping
customer_reviews.author: Julie Downs

customer_reviews.title: good weights bad stand
customer_reviews.text: The weights are about what you’d expect if you’ve ever held a weight before. I appreciate the colorful option they provide since working out is already unenjoyable for me. Guess you could say they brighten up my day. I docked 2 stars because the stand is extremely wobbly. The assembly only required 5 parts and 3 steps so I’m confident I put it together correct. They just needed a wider base or something. It hasn’t fallen over or anything but I’m very careful when removing/replacing the weights.
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great colors, and convenient size!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been quite easy to add some light weights into my daily overall lifestyle using these. On the phone? Grab a weight. Watching TV? Grab some weights! This little “tower” of weights is pretty, due to the cool colors, and the weights themselves are coated in a nice feeling substance. The rack was easy to assemble—they even include a screwdriver. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: T. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Professional Weights Great for Home Use (B+ Grade)
customer_reviews.text: These weights are perfect for home use. They are exactly like the ones found in professional gyms. They are easy to grip, and very colorful. The only downside is that the stand is cheap plastic and may break down the line. But if you need weights, especially ones like these for a great price, check out BalanceFrom GoFit. I would also look into their other products. Katiebabs
customer_reviews.author: Katie Babs

customer_reviews.title: weights are great, rack is NOT
customer_reviews.text: The weights have been great. They are a little smelly at first but that aired out pretty quickly. They were also a tad sticky, but that also wore off pretty fast. 5-stars for the weights. The rack however is really flimsy. The weights are able to balance but it gets knocked over every time I take the weights on or off. I wish they would sell them for cheaper without the rack.
customer_reviews.author: JellyFish

customer_reviews.title: Good weights and rack is holding up fine
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant after reading the reviews to purchase, but with the price I really had to give them a shot. The rack is sturdy and hasn’t had any of the leaning problems others reported, so maybe they fixed the design. The weights are easy to hold and they can support my weight when I push up or plank with them in my hands. So far, things are going great. I use them nearly every day.
customer_reviews.author: JoNY

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My order came packaged well, and included a set of 8 screws and 1 screwdriver (to my surprise!). It was good they sent it with 2 extra screws (only 6 required) because 1 screw was unusable and the area to insert the screwdriver was just molted metal — see pic of screws, the one to the right. I was able to assemble it within 5 minutes and is pretty sturdy. The stand itself is a harder plastic, not metal, and does the job of keeping the weights stable. The weights are made of a nice neoprene that so far has been easy to wipe down. Giving the product 4 stars until I can thoroughly test it all.
customer_reviews.author: D1abla

customer_reviews.title: Just Like At The Gym
customer_reviews.text: During this pandemic I have been participating in on-line classes and was using detergent bottles for weights. I finally broke down and ordered this set of dumbbells. They are exactly like the ones at my gym. I love the neoprene coverings because the weights stay put in my hands much better than the plastic coated weights. The stand was easy to assemble and a perfect way to store them for easy access and less clutter and I didn't have to go searching for a screwdriver because it was included with the package! Overall I was very pleased with this purchase and $41+ it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Traveling Ts

customer_reviews.title: Weights are great, stand is not
customer_reviews.text: So i do not have any complaints about the weights. The stand, however, is horrible. it is flimsy plastic and so it always is tipping over, spilling your weights. So if you are buying this because it comes with a stand, i would go elsewhere. Or if you are buying because it is an affordable purchase of a weight kit, make sure you have a place to hold or store your weights because the plastic is useless.
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: Stand falls apart
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes these, they’re nice to work out with but the stand is SO flimsy it fell apart within the first week. Now the weights are kinda in a pile where someone will catch their toe on them. The stands are expensive and I can’t merit buying one, especially after spending this much on weights and a stand. Overall the weights are nice, but the stand sorely lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: After spending months looking for weights during the pandemic, we were ecstatic to see anything available and not ridiculously overpriced. We ordered these immediately and waited patiently. The weights and stand arrived quicker than expected and were very easy to assemble. The weights do exactly what they're supposed to - they're great for picking up and putting down repeatedly. The grip is comfortable, the stand is easy to move, and we found no issues with them at all so far. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ravenscroft

customer_reviews.title: the stand is garbage, tipped over and dented my wall
customer_reviews.text: the stand is way too flimsy to hold the weights. I put it together, come back the next day and the weights have tilted over and dented my wall because of the flimsy stand. DO NOT USE THE STAND
customer_reviews.author: chaddy

product_meta.title: BalanceFrom GoFit All-Purpose Dumbbells in Pair, or Set with Rack
feature_bullets: 3 pairs of dumbbells in 3-pound, 5-pound, and 8-pound sizes. Ideal for resistance and other trainings
The durable, neoprene material coated cast iron is great for indoor and outdoor workouts
Neoprene coating on weights allow for a secure grip. The hex shape of the dumbbells prevents them from rolling
Easy to assemble. Weight stand is included. A assembly tool is included for your convenience too
All genuine everyday essentials products are covered by a 2-year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
